00011 // brushedmetal.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "material.h"
00014 // BrushedMetal Class Declarations
00015 class BrushedMetal : public Material {
00016 public:
00017         BrushedMetal(Reference<Texture<float> > bump) : bumpMap(bump) { }
00018         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const;
00019         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap;
00020 };
00021 // BrushedMetal Method Definitions
00022 BSDF *BrushedMetal::GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const {
00023         // Declare brushedmetal coefficients
00024         static float diffuse[3] = { 0, 0, 0 };
00025         static float xy0[3] =     {  -1.11854f, -1.11845f, -1.11999f  };
00026         static float z0[3] =      {   1.01272f,  1.01469f,  1.01942f  };
00027         static float e0[3] =      {  15.8708f,  15.6489f,  15.4571f   };
00028         static float xy1[3] =     {  -1.05334f, -1.06409f, -1.08378f  };
00029         static float z1[3] =      {   0.69541f,  0.662178f, 0.626672f };
00030         static float e1[3] =      { 111.267f,   88.9222f,  65.2179f   };
00031         static float xy2[3] =     {  -1.01684f, -1.01635f, -1.01529f  };
00032         static float z2[3] =      {   1.00132f,  1.00112f,  1.00108f  };
00033         static float e2[3] =      { 180.181f,  184.152f,  195.773f    };
00034         static Spectrum xy[3] = { Spectrum(xy0), Spectrum(xy1), Spectrum(xy2) };
00035         static Spectrum z[3] = { Spectrum(z0), Spectrum(z1), Spectrum(z2) };
00036         static Spectrum e[3] = { Spectrum(e0), Spectrum(e1), Spectrum(e2) };
00037         // Allocate _BSDF_, possibly doing bump-mapping with _bumpMap_
00038         DifferentialGeometry dgs;
00039         if (bumpMap)
00040                 Bump(bumpMap, dgGeom, dgShading, &dgs);
00041         else
00042                 dgs = dgShading;
00043         BSDF *bsdf = BSDF_ALLOC(BSDF)(dgs, dgGeom.nn);
00044         bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(Lafortune)(Spectrum(*diffuse), 3, xy, xy, z, e,
00045                 BxDFType(BSDF_REFLECTION | BSDF_GLOSSY)));
00046         return bsdf;
00047 }
00048 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Material * CreateMaterial(const Transform &xform,
00049                 const TextureParams &mp) {
00050         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap = mp.GetFloatTexture("bumpmap", 0.f);
00051         return new BrushedMetal(bumpMap);
00052 }
